title: Colombia Presses Companies on Pricing Data After 23% Wage Hike
description: Colombia’s antitrust authority is pressing companies to disclose detailed information on profit margins and discount strategies, to address concern over possible price fixing in the wake of the country’s recent record minimum wage hike.
content: Colombia’s antitrust authority is pressing companies to disclose detailed information on profit margins and discount strategies, to address concern over possible price fixing in the wake of the country’s recent record minimum wage hike.
